title: Acceleration of object from velocity equation

content.question:
An object moves along a straight line with a velocity \(v\) given as a function of time \(t\) by the equation \(v\left(t\right)=\alpha t^2+\beta t+\gamma\).

Which of the following expressions represents \(\alpha\left(t\right)\), the acceleration of the object as a function of time \(t\).

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
